member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.INWorkQueueClient
member.summary: Interface for Client to implement.

member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.MessageState
member.summary: Current state of a message

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.MessageState.Active
member.summary: Gets active value. Is the message is live and can be pulled from the queue

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.MessageState.InTransaction
member.summary: Gets InTransaction. Means the message is currently tied to a transaction, either during insert of during processing. IOW, this message is currently being inserted or pulled from the queue.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.MessageState.Processed
member.summary: Gets processed state. i.e. This message has been processed and will not be pulled

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.MessageState.Expired
member.summary: Gets if Message has expired and will not be pulled

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.MessageState.RetryExceeded
member.summary: Gets boolean representing if RetryExceeded. Message retry limit has been reached and message will no longer be pulled

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.MessageState.Name
member.summary: Gets the message state string

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.MessageState.Value
member.summary: Gets the message state ID

member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message
member.summary: Represents a Queue Message.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.Id
member.summary: Gets generated unique message id.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.QueueId
member.summary: Gets the id of the queue.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.TransactionId
member.summary: Gets the id of the queue transaction.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.TransactionAction
member.summary: Gets the transaction action. i.e. was this message added or pulled in the transaction.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.AddDateTime
member.summary: Gets the datetime the message was added.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.CloseDateTime
member.summary: Gets the datetime the message was closed, i.e. processed or cancelled or expired.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.Priority
member.summary: Gets the priority of the message. Lower is higher priority.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.MaxRetries
member.summary: Gets number of attempts to have message processed, i.e. commited.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.Retries
member.summary: Gets the number of rollbacks or timeouts before the message expires.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.ExpiryDate
member.summary: Gets DateTime the message will expire.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.CorrelationId
member.summary: Gets the interger correlation id, used by calling application.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.Group
member.summary: Gets string group name. Used by external application for grouping purposes.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Message.Payload
member.summary: Gets actual message data.

member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Queue
member.summary: Represents a Queue.

member.name: M:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Queue.#ctor(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Queue.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique queue id.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Queue.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the queue.

member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Transaction
member.summary: Represents a Queue Transaction

member.name: M:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Transaction.#ctor(System.Int64,NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionState,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Transaction.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique ID for a transaction.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Transaction.State
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the state of the transaction.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Transaction.CreateDateTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time the transaction was created.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Transaction.ExpiryDateTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time the transaction will expire. e.g. after this datetime, the transaction will automatically rollback.

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.Models.Transaction.EndDateTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time the transaction was closed, null if not closed.

member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionAction
member.summary: Represents the action performed within a transaction

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionAction.Add
member.summary: Item was added within a transaction (if rolledback, delete)

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionAction.Pull
member.summary: Item was pulled within transaction, increment retry count if rolledback

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionAction.Name
member.summary: Gets transaction action name

member.name: P:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionAction.Value
member.summary: Gets transaction Action value / id

member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionResult
member.summary: Result of transaction commital
member.remarks: Only commits use the results since commits may have valid responses. If a rollback fails, an exception should be thrown, at least for now

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionResult.Success
member.summary: Transaction was successfully committed

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionResult.Expired
member.summary: Transaction expired before the commit could be completed

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionResult.Closed
member.summary: The transaction was already closed

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionResult.NotFound
member.summary: Transaction could not be found. Perhaps this should be an exception

member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionState
member.summary: The current state of a transaction.

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionState.Unknown
member.summary: This should never occur. It means there is a serious bug.

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionState.Active
member.summary: Transaction is active.

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionState.Commited
member.summary: Transaction has been committed by user.

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionState.RolledBack
member.summary: Transaction was rolled back by user.

member.name: F:NWorkQueue.Common.TransactionState.Expired
member.summary: Transaction was automatically expired due to timeout.

member.name: T:NWorkQueue.Common.WorkQueueException
member.summary: Exception thrown for unique WorkQueue exceptions.

member.name: M:NWorkQueue.Common.WorkQueueException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
